testcase.classname: Whenever user creates an event on Address CRI UI, TxMA S3 bucket should how a log of this event within a minute.
testcase.name: Testing Address CRI TxMA integration
testcase.system-out: Given the user is on Address CRI............................................passed When the user enters their postcode and click `Find address`................passed When the user chooses their address from dropdown and click `Choose address`.passed When the user enters the date they moved into their current address.........passed When the user clicks `I confirm my details are correct`.....................passed Then Response from Address CRI Integration displays the user's address in JSON.passed When the user clicks on summaryTest and reads the sub value from JSON.......passed Then the audit S3 should have a new event with the postcode provided........passed
